Efendi Nahi.verse 105:1: Vallë, a nuk ke dëgjuar ti se si ka vepruar Zoti yt me ushtrinë (pronarët) e elefantëve?!
Efendi Nahi.verse 105:2: A nuk ju shkuankot dinakëritë e tyre,
Efendi Nahi.verse 105:3: e dërgoi kundër tyre tufa zogjësh – (Ebabilash),
Efendi Nahi.verse 105:4: të cilët hedhnin mbi ta copa dheu (të forcuara si gurë),
Efendi Nahi.verse 105:5: e i bëri ata si ndonjë gjeth që është hëngër (prej krimit – tëjes)? gurë),

null.verse 105:1: (Ya Peyğəmbər!) Məgər Rəbbinin fil sahiblərinə (Kə'bəni dağıtmaq üçün fillərlə Məkkənin üstünə gələn həbəş ordusuna) nələr etdiyini görmədinmi?!
null.verse 105:2: Məgər (Rəbbin) onların hiyləsini boşa çıxartmadımı?!
null.verse 105:3: Onların üstünə qatar-qatar quşlar (əbabil quşları) göndərdi.
null.verse 105:4: (O quşlar) onlara bişmiş gildən düzəlmiş (möhkəm xırda) daşlar atırdı.
null.verse 105:5: (Rəbbin) onları (həşərat tərəfindən) yeyilmiş əkin yarpağına (saman çöpünə) döndərdi!

null.verse 105:1: Zar nisi čuo šta je sa vlasnicima slona Gospodar tvoj uradio!
null.verse 105:2: Zar lukavstvo njihovo nije omeo
null.verse 105:3: i protiv njih jata ptica poslao,
null.verse 105:4: koje su na njih grumenje od gline pečene bacale,
null.verse 105:5: pa ih On kao lišće koje su crvi istočili učinio? bacale,

null.verse 105:1: আপনি কি দেখেননি আপনার পালনকর্তা হস্তীবাহিনীর সাথে কিরূপ ব্যবহার করেছেন?
null.verse 105:2: তিনি কি তাদের চক্রান্ত নস্যাৎ করে দেননি?
null.verse 105:3: তিনি তাদের উপর প্রেরণ করেছেন ঝাঁকে ঝাঁকে পাখী,
null.verse 105:4: যারা তাদের উপর পাথরের কংকর নিক্ষেপ করছিল।
null.verse 105:5: অতঃপর তিনি তাদেরকে ভক্ষিত তৃণসদৃশ করে দেন। করছিল।

Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 105:1: Не видя ли [о, Мухаммад] как постъпи твоят Господ с владетелите на слона?
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 105:2: Не превърна ли Той коварството им в заблуда?
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 105:3: И изпрати срещу тях ята от птици,
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 105:4: които ги замеряха с камъни от печена глина.
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 105:5: И ги стори да приличат на проядени листа.

null.verse 105:1: 難道你不知道你的主怎樣處治象的主人們嗎？
null.verse 105:2: 難道他沒有使他們的計謀 ,變成無益的嗎？
null.verse 105:3: 他曾派遣成群的鳥去傷他們 ,
null.verse 105:4: 以粘土石射擊他們 ,
null.verse 105:5: 使他們變成吃剩的乾草一樣。 ,

null.verse 105:1: Neviděls, jak naložil Pán tvůj s lidmi slona?
null.verse 105:2: Což neobrátil úklad jejich ve zmatky
null.verse 105:3: a neposlal na ně v hejnech ptáky,
null.verse 105:4: kteří po nich vrhali oblázky z hlíny pálené,
null.verse 105:5: a učinil, že podobnými byli slámě ohryzané? pálené,

null.verse 105:1: Hebt gij niet vernomen, hoe uw Heer de bezitters der olifanten behandelde?
null.verse 105:2: Heeft Hij hun plannen niet teniet gedaan?
null.verse 105:3: Zond Hij geen zwermen vogels op hen neer?
null.verse 105:4: En wierpen deze geen klompen klei?
null.verse 105:5: Dat hen maakte als fijn gekauwd (door het vee) stro? klei?

Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 105:1: Hast thou not seen how thy Lord dealt with the owners of the Elephant ?
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 105:2: Did He not bring their stratagem to naught,
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 105:3: And send against them swarms of flying creatures,
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 105:4: Which pelted them with stones of baked clay,
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 105:5: And made them like green crops devoured (by cattle) ? clay,

Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 105:1: Seest thou not how thy Lord dealt with the Companions of the Elephant?
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 105:2: Did He not make their treacherous plan go astray?
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 105:3: And He sent against them Flights of Birds,
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 105:4: Striking them with stones of baked clay.
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 105:5: Then did He make them like an empty field of stalks and straw, (of which the corn) has been eaten up.

Arthur J. Arberry.verse 105:1: Hast thou not seen how thy Lord did with the Men of the Elephant?
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 105:2: Did He not make their guile to go astray?
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 105:3: And He loosed upon them birds in flights,
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 105:4: hurling against them stones of baked clay
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 105:5: and He made them like green blades devoured.

Muhammad Asad.verse 105:1: ART THOU NOT aware of how thy Sustainer dealt with the Army of the Elephant?
Muhammad Asad.verse 105:2: Did He not utterly confound their artful planning?
Muhammad Asad.verse 105:3: Thus, He let loose upon them great swarms of flying creatures
Muhammad Asad.verse 105:4: which smote them with stone-hard blows of chastisement pre-ordained,
Muhammad Asad.verse 105:5: and caused them to become like a field of grain that has been eaten down to stubble

Martin Lings.verse 105:1: Hast thou not seen how they Lord dealt with the masters of the elephant?
Martin Lings.verse 105:3: Did He not turn their plots awry?
Martin Lings.verse 105:5: He sent upon them dense clouds of birds.
Martin Lings.verse 105:7: That pelted them with inscribed stones.
Martin Lings.verse 105:9: Thus made He them like greenery eaten down.
Martin Lings.verse 105:13: A Sufi Saint of the Twentieth Century (1961) •
Martin Lings.verse 105:15: The Quranic Art of Calligraphy and Illumination (1976) •
Martin Lings.verse 105:21: Splendours of Qur’an Calligraphy and Illumination (2005) ARTICLES•
Martin Lings.verse 105:23: “The Islamic and Christian Conceptions of the March of Time” (1954) The Islamic Quarterly, Vol.
Martin Lings.verse 105:24: “The Origins of Sufism (1956) The Islamic Quarterly, Vol.

Martin Lings.verse 105:27: “The Nature and Origin of Sufism”: Islamic Spirituality (1985) •
Martin Lings.verse 105:28: “Mystical Poetry”: The Cambridge History of Arabic Literature, Vol.
Martin Lings.verse 105:31: “Human Origins and Destinies According to the Great Religions of the World” •

Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 105:1: Have you not seen how your Lord dealt with the People of the Elephant?
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 105:2: Has He not turned their plan into nullity?
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 105:3: And He sent upon them flying birds in flocks,
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 105:4: throwing upon them stones of baked clay,
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 105:5: and thus He turned them into an eaten-up chaff.

Royal Aal al-Bayt Institute Translation.verse 105:1: Have you not considered the way in which your Lord dealt with the Men of the Elephant?
Royal Aal al-Bayt Institute Translation.verse 105:2: Did He not make their stratagem go astray,
Royal Aal al-Bayt Institute Translation.verse 105:3: and unleashed upon them swarms of birds,
Royal Aal al-Bayt Institute Translation.verse 105:4: pelting them with stones of baked clay,
Royal Aal al-Bayt Institute Translation.verse 105:5: thus making them like devoured blades? clay,

Recitations of Ibrahim walk from saheeh.verse 105:1: Have you not seen how your Lord dealt with those who had elephants?
Recitations of Ibrahim walk from saheeh.verse 105:2: Did He not thwart their crafty designs?
Recitations of Ibrahim walk from saheeh.verse 105:3: And He sent on to them (ambient) swarms of birds,
Recitations of Ibrahim walk from saheeh.verse 105:4: Which pelted them with stone-hard slugs.
Recitations of Ibrahim walk from saheeh.verse 105:5: Then (Allah made them perish) like chewed-up chaff.

null.verse 105:1: Etkö ole Miettinyt mitä Herrasi teki niille, jotka norsuilla hyökkäsivät?
null.verse 105:2: Eikö Hän saattanut sekasortoon heidän sotaretkensä?
null.verse 105:3: Ja lähettänyt heitä vastaan lintuparvia,
null.verse 105:4: jotka sinkoutuivat heihin kovien kivien lailla.
null.verse 105:5: Näin Hän teki heistä kuin madonsyömää pellonsänkeä.

Jean-Louis Michon.verse 105:1: N'as-tu pas vu comment ton Seigneur a agi envers les compagnons de l'éléphant ?
Jean-Louis Michon.verse 105:3: et envoyé contre eux des nuées d'oiseaux
Jean-Louis Michon.verse 105:4: qui leur ont lancé des pierres marquées de sceaux.
Jean-Louis Michon.verse 105:5: Il les a alors rendus semblables à du chaume dévoré.

Muhammad Hamidullah.verse 105:1: N’as-tu pas vu comment ton Seigneur a agi envers les gens de l’éléphant .
Muhammad Hamidullah.verse 105:2: N’a-t-Il pas rendu leur ruse complètement vaine ?
Muhammad Hamidullah.verse 105:3: et envoyé sur eux des oiseaux par volées
Muhammad Hamidullah.verse 105:4: qui leur lançaient des pierres d’argile ?
Muhammad Hamidullah.verse 105:5: Et Il les a rendus semblables à une paille mâchée.

null.verse 105:1: Hast du nicht gesehen, wie dein Herr mit den Besitzern des Elefanten verfuhr?
null.verse 105:2: Machte Er nicht ihren Anschlag zunichte?
null.verse 105:3: Und Er sandte Schwärme von Vögeln wider sie,
null.verse 105:4: Die die Ziegel aus Steine von Ton auf sie warfen;
null.verse 105:5: Und Er machte sie gleich abgeweideten Halmen.

null.verse 105:1: Apakah kamu tidak memperhatikan bagaimana Tuhanmu telah bertindak terhadap tentara bergajah?
null.verse 105:2: Bukankah Dia telah menjadikan tipu daya mereka (untuk menghancurkan Ka’bah) itu sia-sia?,
null.verse 105:3: Dan Dia mengirimkan kepada mereka burung yang berbondong-bondong,
null.verse 105:4: yang melempari mereka dengan batu (berasal) dari tanah yang terbakar,
null.verse 105:5: lalu Dia menjadikan mereka seperti daun-daun yang dimakan (ulat).

null.verse 105:1: Non hai visto come agì il tuo Signore con quelli dell'elefante?
null.verse 105:2: Non fece fallire le loro astuzie?
null.verse 105:3: Mandò contro di loro stormi di uccelli
null.verse 105:4: lancianti su di loro pietre di argilla indurita.
null.verse 105:5: Li ridusse come pula svuotata .

null.verse 105:1: あなたの主が，象の仲間に，どう対処なされたか，知らなかったのか。
null.verse 105:2: かれは，かれらの計略を壊滅させられたではないか。
null.verse 105:3: かれらの上に群れなす数多の鳥を遣わされ，
null.verse 105:4: 焼き土の礫を投げ付けさせて，
null.verse 105:5: 食い荒らされた藁屑のようになされた。 焼き土の礫を投げ付けさせて，

null.verse 105:1: 주님께서 코끼리의 무리를 어떻게 하셨는지 그 소식이 이르지 아니 했느뇨
null.verse 105:2: 그들의 음모를 파멸시켜 버리 지 아니 했더뇨
null.verse 105:3: 하나님은 그들에게 새떼를 보 내어
null.verse 105:4: 모래와 흙으로 된 돌맹이들을 던지셨나니
null.verse 105:5: 그들은 다 갉아 먹어버린 마 른 잎과도 같았더라

null.verse 105:1: ئایا نه‌تزانیووه (ئه‌ی پێغه‌مبه‌ر صلی الله علیه وسلم) په‌روه‌ردگارت چی کرد به‌خاوه‌ن فیله‌کان؟!
null.verse 105:2: ئایا سه‌ری لێ نه‌شێواندن و پیلان و نه‌خشه‌کانیانی پووچ نه‌کرده‌وه‌؟!
null.verse 105:3: پۆل پۆل باڵنده‌ی نه‌نارده سه‌ریان؟!
null.verse 105:4: تا به‌به‌ردی سه‌نگگڵ (وه‌ك خشتی سووره‌وه کراو)، به‌رد بارانیان بکه‌ن.
null.verse 105:5: سه‌ره‌نجام وه‌کو پووش و په‌ڵاش و کاری خوراوی لێکردن، (درێژه‌ی ئه‌م به‌سه‌رهاته له { ژیان نامه‌ی پێغه‌مبه‌ری مه‌زندا} له نووسینی مامۆستا عبدالعزیز پاڕه‌زانی دا ته‌ماشا بکه‌).

null.verse 105:1: Tidakkah engkau mengetahui bagaimana Tuhanmu telah melakukan kepada angkatan tentera (yang dipimpin oleh pembawa) Gajah, (yang hendak meruntuhkan Kaabah)?
null.verse 105:2: Bukankah Tuhanmu telah menjadikan rancangan jahat mereka dalam keadaan yang rugi dan memusnahkan mereka?
null.verse 105:3: Dan Dia telah menghantarkan kepada mereka (rombongan) burung berpasuk-pasukan;
null.verse 105:4: Yang melontar mereka dengan batu-batu dari sejenis tanah yang dibakar keras;
null.verse 105:5: Lalu Dia menjadikan mereka hancur berkecai seperti daun-daun kayu yang dimakan ulat.

null.verse 105:1: آيا نديدى پروردگارت با فيل سواران ( لشكر ابرهه كه براى نابودى كعبه آمده بودند) چه كرد؟!
null.verse 105:2: آيا نقشه آنها را در ضلالت و تباهى قرار نداد؟!
null.verse 105:3: و بر سر آنها پرندگانى را گروه گروه فرستاد،
null.verse 105:4: كه با سنگهاى كوچكى آنان را هدف قرارمى‏دادند;
null.verse 105:5: سرانجام آنها را همچون كاه خورده‏شده (و متلاشى) قرار داد!

null.verse 105:1: Não reparaste no que o teu Senhor fez, com os possuidores dos elefantes?
null.verse 105:2: Acaso, não desbaratou Ele as suas conspirações,
null.verse 105:3: Enviando contra eles um bando de criaturas aladas,
null.verse 105:4: Que lhes arrojaram pedras de argila endurecida
null.verse 105:5: E os deixou como plantações devastadas (pelo gado)?

Lucrarea (traducere úi editare) a fost r.verse 105:1: Oare n-ai vãzut tu ce a fãcut Domnul tãu cu oamenii elefan- tului?!
Lucrarea (traducere úi editare) a fost r.verse 105:2: Oare nu a fãcut El vicleșugul lor sã fie în deșert?!
Lucrarea (traducere úi editare) a fost r.verse 105:3: Și a trimis peste ei pãsãri în stoluri,
Lucrarea (traducere úi editare) a fost r.verse 105:4: Ca sã arunce asupra lor cu pietre din lut ars!
Lucrarea (traducere úi editare) a fost r.verse 105:5: Și i-a fãcut pe ei ca un ogor mâncat.

George Grigore, Coranul.verse 105:1: Nu ai văzut ce a făcut Domnul tău cu oamenii elefantului?
George Grigore, Coranul.verse 105:2: Oare nu a făcut vicleşugul o rătăcire?
George Grigore, Coranul.verse 105:3: Oare nu a trimis asupra lor păsări în stoluri,
George Grigore, Coranul.verse 105:4: ce aruncau peste ei pietre din Iad?
George Grigore, Coranul.verse 105:5: Şi astfel i-a făcut aidoma unor paie mâncate.

null.verse 105:1: Видал ли ты, как поступил Господьс людьми слона,
null.verse 105:2: Разрушив их зловещий план?
null.verse 105:3: Он против них аба’билей2335 послал,
null.verse 105:4: Которые комками обожженной глинылюдей слона сразили.
null.verse 105:5: Затем он превратил их в мертво полеСоломинок и стеблей с разъеденнымнутром.

null.verse 105:1: ¿No has visto cómo obró tu Señor con los del elefante?
null.verse 105:2: ¿No desbarató su artimaña
null.verse 105:3: y envió contra ellos bandadas de aves,
null.verse 105:4: que descargaron sobre ellos piedras de arcilla,
null.verse 105:5: dejándolos como espigas desgranadas?

null.verse 105:1: (நபியே!) யானை(ப் படை)க் காரர்களை உம் இறைவன் என்ன செய்தான் என்பதை நீர் பார்க்கவில்லையா?
null.verse 105:2: அவர்களுடைய சூழ்ச்சியை அவன் பாழாக்கி விடவில்லையா?
null.verse 105:3: மேலும், அவர்கள் மீது பறவைகளைக் கூட்டங் கூட்டமாக அவன் அனுப்பினான்.
null.verse 105:4: சுடப்பட்ட சிறு கற்களை அவர்கள் மீது அவை எறிந்தன.
null.verse 105:5: அதனால், அவர்களை மென்று தின்னப்பட்ட வைக்கோலைப் போல் அவன் ஆக்கி விட்டான்.

null.verse 105:1: เจ้าไม่เห็นดอกหรือว่า พระเจ้าของเจ้าได้กระทำกับพวก เจ้าของช้างอย่างไร?
null.verse 105:2: พระองค์มิได้ทรงทำให้แผนการณ์ของพวกเขาสูญสิ้นดอก หรือ?
null.verse 105:3: และได้ทรงส่งนกเป็นฝูงๆ ลงมาบนพวกเขา
null.verse 105:4: มันได้ขว้างพวกเขาด้วยหินที่ทำด้วยดินแข็ง
null.verse 105:5: แล้วพระองค์ทรงทำให้พวกเขาเป็นเช่นใบไม้ที่ถูก (สัตว์) กิน

null.verse 105:1: Onların kötü planlarını boşa çıkarmadı mı?
null.verse 105:2: Onların üstüne ebâbil kuşlarını gönderdi.
null.verse 105:3: O kuşlar, onların üzerlerine pişkin tuğladan yapılmış taşlar atıyordu.
null.verse 105:4: Böylece Allah onları yenilip çiğnenmiş ekine çevirdi.

null.verse 105:1: کیا تم نے نہیں دیکھا کہ تمہارے پروردگار نے ہاتھی والوں کے ساتھ کیا کیا
null.verse 105:2: کيا آپ نے نہيں ديکھا کہ آپ کے رب نے ہاتھي والوں کے ساتھ کيا سلوک کياo
null.verse 105:3: کيا اس نے ان کے مکر و فريب کو باطل و ناکام نہيں کر دياo
null.verse 105:4: کیا ان کا داؤں غلط نہیں کیا؟ (گیا)
null.verse 105:5: اور ان پر جھلڑ کے جھلڑ جانور بھیجے
null.verse 105:6: اور اس نے ان پر (ہر سمت سے) پرندوں کے جھنڈ کے جھنڈ بھيج ديئےo
null.verse 105:7: جو ان پر کنکريلے پتھر مارتے تھےo
null.verse 105:8: جو ان پر کھنگر کی پتھریاں پھینکتے تھے
null.verse 105:9: تو ان کو ایسا کر دیا جیسے کھایا ہوا بھس
null.verse 105:10: پھر (ا? نے) ان کو کھائے ہوئے بھوسے کي طرح (پامال) کر دياo بھس

null.verse 105:1: Роббинг фил соҳибларини қандоқ қилганини билмадингми?
null.verse 105:2: Уларнинг макру ҳийласини зое кетказмадими?
null.verse 105:3: Ва уларнинг устига тўп-тўп қушларни юбормадими?
null.verse 105:4: Лойдан пиширилган тошларни отадиганларни?
null.verse 105:5: Бас, уларни қурт еб ташлаган ўсимликка ўхшатиб юбормадими?.
